name: Flipbox Addon for WPBakery Page Builder (formerly Visual Composer)
author: themebon

sections.description:
Checkout our Latest WordPress Themes – 100% Free

Flipbox for visual composer addon lets you add modern flipbox to your website with various options.. Works with latest Visual Composer v5.2.x

Note: you can get this addon from Essential WPBakery Page Builder (formerly Visual Composer) Addons. It�s recommended to purchase the Essential WPBakery Page Builder Addons which contain other addons in the future update:

Flip Box – Demo
Flip Box 3D – Demo
Flip Box Advanced – Demo

Features

  • 3 Flipbox style
  • Background Image for front and back
  • Horizontal and vertical effect
  • Super Flexible
  • Icon from 6 font libraries
  • Unlimited Colors.
  • Set image or icon.
  • Read more button.
  • Mobile friendly
  • CSS3 Animation
  • Super easy Installation.
  • 100% responsive.
  • Easy user interface.
  • Works with any theme.
  • All Major browser supported.
sections.installation:
Installing this plugin as regular wordpress plugin. First you need to install Visual Composer plugin then install Flipbox Addon For Visual Composer.

This addon plugin works like other page builder addon plugin. Go to new page then click on Visual Composer builder then click on Add Element you should see Flip Box menu as Name “Flip Box” on Menu Top, click on it you will see shortcode panel.
